org.apache.spark.unsafe.memory

Class HeapMemoryAllocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.spark.unsafe.memory.HeapMemoryAllocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryAllocator

    public class HeapMemoryAllocator
extends java.lang.Object
implements MemoryAllocator
    A simple MemoryAllocator that can allocate up to 16GB using a JVM long primitive array.

    • Method Detail

      • allocate

        public MemoryBlock allocate(long size)
                     throws java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
        Description copied from interface: MemoryAllocator
        Allocates a contiguous block of memory. Note that the allocated memory is not guaranteed to be zeroed out (call `fill(0)` on the result if this is necessary).
        Specified by:
